tool_description: The API with 40+ awesome and uncommon features related to colors, hashing, encoding, bytes, ip, numbers, random and data validation.
name: certer.org
title: certer.org

api_list.name: /random/ipv4
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://certer-org-v1.p.rapidapi.com/random/ipv4"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "certer-org-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
